casebody.data:
STATE OF MONTANA, Plaintiff, vs. HAYS SCHUYLER SPELMAN, Defendant.

DECISION

No. 4908 DATED this 13th day of May, 1977.

The application of the above-named defendant for a review of the sentence of Seven and one half years imposed on February 7, 1977, was fully heard and after a careful consideration of the entire matter it is decided that:

The sentence be and remain as originally imposed.

We wish to thank Lon Withrow, of the Montana Defender Project, for his assistance to the defendant and to this Court.

SENTENCE REVIEW DIVISION

Jack L. Green, Chairman; Peter C. Meloy.
